# rating

**Instance Property**

The rating for the command event.

## Declaration

```swift
var rating: Float { get }
```

## Discussion

The `rating` property must be between the minimum and maximum ratings defined by the [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPRatingCommand/maximumRating] and [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPRatingCommand/minimumRating] properties.
title: rating
